feels.name: Trust
feels.quote: He thinks with me, or rather, he thinks a whole world of which my thought is but a poor twopenny mirror.

causedByEvent.name: Mr. Casaubon's agreement with her views

feels.name: Joy
feels.quote: Miss Brooke was hasty in her trust, it is not therefore clear that Mr. Casaubon was unworthy of it.

feels.name: Anticipation
feels.quote: There had risen before her the girlâ€™s vision of a possible future for herself to which she looked forward with trembling hope.

causedByEvent.name: Mr. Casaubon's statement of loneliness and need for companionship
